scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --config=istanbul.json _mocha -- --reporter min tests.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.version-ready: (npm test && npm run push-ready) || (printf '\e[31m×\e[0mAddress above issues before bumping version' && echo && exit 1)
scripts.push-ready: git remote update && git merge-base --is-ancestor @{u} @ || (printf '\e[31m×\e[0m Local is behind origin (pull/fetch to synchronize before pushing)' && echo && exit 1) && printf '\e[32m✓\e[0m Local is at or ahead of origin (push away)' && echo
